typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> factsales
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> dimcust
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> dimprod
factsales, dimcust join(factsales@CustomerKey == dimcust@CustomerKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1, dimprod join(factsales@ProductKey == dimprod@ProductKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		OrderDateKey,
		OrderQuantity,
		ProductStandardCost,
		SalesAmount,
		TaxAmt,
		TotalProductCost,
		UnitPrice,
		AddressLine1,
		EnglishEducation,
		EnglishOccupation,
		FirstName,
		Gender,
		HouseOwnerFlag,
		LastName,
		MaritalStatus,
		NumberCarsOwned,
		NumberChildrenAtHome,
		Phone,
		Title,
		TotalChildren,
		Class,
		Color,
		EnglishProductName,
		ListPrice,
		ModelName,
		Style,
		Weight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(MaritalStatus,
		HouseOwnerFlag),
	salesbyownermarried = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> SalesByOwnerByMarried
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Color,
		Style),
	salesbycolorstyle = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> SalesByColorStyle
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NumberCarsOwned,
		NumberChildrenAtHome),
	avgsales = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> AvgSalesByCarsAndChildren
SalesByOwnerByMarried sort(desc(salesbyownermarried, true)) ~> Sort1
AvgSalesByCarsAndChildren sort(desc(avgsales, true)) ~> Sort2
SalesByColorStyle sort(desc(salesbycolorstyle, true)) ~> Sort3
Sort1 derive(tshash = toString(sha2(256,currentTimestamp(),salesbyownermarried)),
		salesbyownermarried = toDouble(salesbyownermarried)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Sort2 derive(thash = toString(sha2(256,currentTimestamp(),avgsales))) ~> DerivedColumn2
Sort3 derive(thash = toString(sha2(256,currentTimestamp(),salesbycolorstyle))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink3
